name: tm24
effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: DragonBreath)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A powerful electric
attack that may
cause paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A powerful electric
attack that may
cause paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A strong electrical
attack that may
also leave the foe
paralyzed.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A strong electric blast is loosed at
the foe. It may also leave the foe
paralyzed.

A strong electric blast is loosed at
the foe. It may also leave the foe
paralyzed.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
A strong electric blast is loosed at
the foe. It may also leave the foe
paralyzed.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A strong electric blast is loosed at the
target. It may also leave the target
with paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
A strong electric blast is loosed at the
target. It may also leave the target
with paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A strong electric blast crashes down on
the target. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user slashes at the target by crossing its
scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This attack can be used only if the user is asleep.
The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
